adept.kbapi

Interface IQuery

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KBQueryProcessor

    public interface IQuery
    DEFT Knowledge Base query interface

        List<adept.common.KBID> getEntitiesByStringReference(String value)
        Query entity objects by mention value We use case-insensitive exact string match.

        List of entity IDs that have atleast one mention that matches the argument regex
